function.name: zip_entry_compressionmethod
function.description: Return a string containing the compression method used on a particular entry.

function.name: zip_entry_name
function.description: Return the name given a ZZip entry.

function.name: zip_entry_filesize
function.description: Return the actual filesize of a ZZip entry.

function.name: zip_entry_read
function.description: Read X bytes from an opened zip entry.

function.name: zip_open
function.description: Open a new zip archive for reading.

function.name: zip_entry_open
function.description: Open a Zip File, pointed by the resource entry.

function.name: zip_entry_compressedsize
function.description: Return the compressed size of a ZZip entry.

function.name: zip_read
function.description: Returns the next file in the archive.
